DOC.brief_summary: The study intends to assess the utility of performing a follow up X rays in children admitted to pediatric wards with lobar pneumonia. Usually those children are discharged with a recommendation for a follow up X rays but there are no enough studies proving that this recommendation is really necessary.
DOC.brief_title: Value of Radiological Follow up in Children Hospitalized With Lobar Pneumonia
DOC.detailed_description: Thew study will include follow up data in a group of about 200 patients admitted with lobar pneumonia during the years 2006 to 2007. All the clinical and laboratory data will be collected and also the X rays findings. The findings of follow up X rays if they were performed will also be summarized.
DOC.criteria: All pediatric patients discharged with the diagnosis of lobar pneumonia. Patients with diagnosis of chronic diseases.
